name: The Bed Was Cold
description:
Disclaimer: This is a so-called soft horror game, intended to convey a story rather than scare the player.  There is no scary imagery beyond that which is   shown in the screenshots, but there are sudden flashing lights, blood, and sound effects.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 33.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys/WASD: Move
  • Space: Interact

Tools

  • Unity 3D
  • Paint.NET
  • SFXR
  • FLStudio

Inspiration (go play these games, really, they're great!)

  • Lone Survivor, by Jasper Byrne:   http://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/209830/
  • The Mirror Lied: http://freebirdgames.com/games/the-mirror-lied/

If you have any criticisms, leave a comment below, or tweet me at   https://twitter.com/lectvs
